59e2c4f4-55dc-4c3c-9da2-b7e46714173d.description: Earners of the IEP Method® Positive Energy Coach badge are active bench members for the Active Choices, Inc. coaching team. Requirements consist of previous completion of an ICF-Accredited coach training program, completion of IEP Method® proficiency training, and completed support team requirements in live IEP training classroom.
59e2c4f4-55dc-4c3c-9da2-b7e46714173d.name: IEP Method® Positive Energy Coach

badge_template_activities.title: Previous completion of an ICF-Accredited coach training program
Completion of IEP Method® proficiency training
Active ACI Bench Member
Room Angel attendance at live IEP Fundamentals launch

6388eb3d-c6c4-4553-af9b-864e1f27bd7b.description: Earners of the Certified Positive Energy Leader: IEP Activator Internal Strategist badge have satisfactorily completed the ACI program requirements to support their awareness, practice and leadership through their Intentional Energetic Presence®. Requirements consist of experiential and live trainings, self-study courses, plus receiving coaching and space for reflection. Earner has shown proficiency in the foundations of the IEP Method® and demonstrated elevated leadership in facilitating.
6388eb3d-c6c4-4553-af9b-864e1f27bd7b.name: Certified IEP Method® Positive Energy Leader: IEP-Activator Internal Strategist (Level 2)

badge_template_activities.title: Earner must have organizational sponsorship of an IEP-Activator program. Requirements include attendance at a live IEP-Activator Launch and a live IEP-Activator Level 2 Training conducted by Active Choices, Inc. Also includes active participation in an IEP Leadership and IEP Activator Cohort, and attendance and completion of ‘Room Angel’ duties at live organizational sessions/launches.

Facilitate and lead the IEP tools in group format, complete 20-minute coaching conversations with 10 individuals using the IEP tools, facilitate and lead and IEP Learning Lab with peers inside the organization, design and lead a 4-month peer cohort, and complete session with PEW-i Coach for final review.

Successful submission of certification application, including satisfactory answers to the following: 1) Top three things you learned from the program; 2) How IEP has impacted you personally and/or professionally; 3) What small actions will you commit to next week, next month, and over the next year to keep the work alive.

aecb8d44-0b8e-475a-be5a-b67c7ec4f0ea.description: Earners of the Certified Positive Energy Leader: IEP Activator badge have satisfactorily completed the ACI program requirements to support their awareness, practice and leadership through their Intentional Energetic Presence®. Requirements consist of experiential and live trainings, self-study courses, plus receiving coaching and space for reflection. Earner has shown proficiency in the foundations of the IEP Method® and demonstrated leadership in facilitating the IEP tools with others.
aecb8d44-0b8e-475a-be5a-b67c7ec4f0ea.name: Certified IEP Method® Positive Energy Leader: IEP- Activator (Level 1)

badge_template_activities.title: Attendance at a live IEP Fundamentals Launch and a live IEP-Activator Launch conducted by Active Choices, Inc. Active participation in an IEP Leadership or IEP Activator Cohort.
Completion of IEP Method® self-study courses within the Positive Energy Workplace Community, including 'Intro to IEP' and the '30 Days of IEP Sheets Challenge'.
Facilitate and lead the IEP tools in group format, complete 20-minute coaching conversations with 10 individuals using the IEP tools, and session with PEW-i Coach for final review.

Successful submission of certification application, including satisfactory answers to the following: 1) Top three things you learned from the program; 2) How IEP has impacted you personally and/or professionally; 3) What small actions will you commit to next week, next month, and over the next year to keep the work alive.

93ef6089-bc77-4840-86e9-2bdc2293945b.description: Earners of the Certified Positive Energy Leader: Level 1 badge have satisfactorily completed the ACI program requirements to support their awareness and practice of their Intentional Energetic Presence®. Requirements consist of experiential and live trainings and self study courses, and Earner has shown proficiency in the foundations of the IEP Method®.
93ef6089-bc77-4840-86e9-2bdc2293945b.name: Certified IEP Method® Positive Energy Leader: Level 1

badge_template_activities.title: Attendance at a live IEP Fundamentals Launch conducted by Active Choices, Inc.
Completion of IEP Method® self-study courses within the Positive Energy Workplace Community, including 'Intro to IEP' and the '30 Days of IEP Sheets Challenge'.
Successful submission of certification application.

e24f42bb-0365-46e2-a73b-dcf6fd401566.description: Earners of the Certified Positive Energy Leader: Level 2 badge have satisfactorily completed the ACI program requirements to support their awareness, practice and leadership through their Intentional Energetic Presence®. Requirements consist of experiential and live trainings, self-study courses, plus receiving coaching and space for reflection. Earner has shown proficiency in the foundations of the IEP Method® and demonstrated leadership sharing the work with others.
e24f42bb-0365-46e2-a73b-dcf6fd401566.name: Certified IEP Method® Positive Energy Leader: Level 2

badge_template_activities.title: Attendance at a live IEP Fundamentals Launch conducted by Active Choices, Inc. and active participation in an IEP Leadership Cohort.
Completion of IEP Method® self-study courses within the Positive Energy Workplace Community, including 'Intro to IEP' and the '30 Days of IEP Sheets Challenge'.
Satisfactory Cohort leader evaluation, request and receive feedback from 3 peers, and Session with PEW-i Coach for final review.

Successful submission of certification application, including satisfactory answers to the following: 1) Top three things you learned from the program; 2) How IEP has impacted you personally and/or professionally; 3) What small actions will you commit to next week, next month, and over the next year to keep the work alive.

11f9ba80-7c0a-485a-98fb-153ee56ba649.description: Organizations with this certification have completed rigorous program requirements to create an authentically positive cultural impact in the company. Based on ACI’s proprietary IEP Method®, requirements include company performance and leadership alignment with 7 Indicators of a Positive Energy Workplace, at least 40% leadership participation in completion of the IEP programming and fieldwork, and an marked increase in performance in the Positive Energy Workplace Initiative (PEW-i) diagnostic.
11f9ba80-7c0a-485a-98fb-153ee56ba649.name: Certified Positive Energy Workplace™

badge_template_activities.title: A minimum of 40% leadership participation in completion of the IEP programming and fieldwork.
Organization has completed (or is current enrolled in) one of the Positive Energy Workplace Initiative™ (PEW-i) enterprise-wide programs.
Organization has appointed and maintains at least two current IEP-Activator leaders (per 100 participants) within the company to support and further the IEP Method® fieldwork.
